name: Paint Master the game
description:
Oh no! On the planet Paint Earth strange things are happening! You need to discover mysteries of this world and save it!

This game(demo) inprised by

  1. Baldi's Basics in education and learing
  2. Little Big Planet
  3. Battletoads
  4. Dark Souls(?)

This is just demo, don't be angry. A beta version will have better graphics and more l e v e l s.

How to download it?

  1. Press "Download now"
  2. Press the link "No, just take me to downloads"
  3. Launch the game
  4. Launch the game(this is a SFX archive because this demo doesn't have any save-system)

Extra info: Press F5 to save your position(Press it when you reach the boss).

P.S. I hope u'll like my project and support it :3
